headline: Voltage co-founder: Bitcoin’s Lightning Network is bringing crypto into daily life
summary: Bitcoin’s next major leap isn’t another new blockchain, it’s speed, scale, and usability on the original one. That’s the view of Aaron Bollinger, co-founder of Voltage, a U.S.-based Bitcoin infrastructure firm pioneering scalable payments on the Lightning Network. Speaking with TheStreet ...
